attributes.action: LINK OLD AGE PENSIONS TO FINAL SALARY SO THAT ALL PENSIONERS WILL BE ENTITLED TO RECEIVE AN ADEQUATE INCOME
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the Government to ensure that people on state old age pensions are treated with humanity. Link the State Pension to average earnings or final salary so that all old age pensioners are legally entitled to an adequate income. Abolish the bureaucracy of means tested benefits for old age pensioners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
